review: I bought two of these, one for the Den and one for the bedroom. Overall I was pleased but the connection to my wireless was spotty. The one in the bedroom kept dropping the connection. I added a WiFi extender that solved the problem. However, both of them would tend to lock up during streaming (not always) which required a reboot. I would recommend spending a little on the Roku 3 which has proven to be a mure better unit with none of the problems I experienced with the streaming stick.
author: James Taylor

review: I saved $10 by purchasing a remanufactured Roku Stick with the same warranty as a new one. This product performs everything I was looking for. Though it does sometimes seem to lag in certain apps, I do not think it's due to the product but instead my internet connection. Perfect for Netflix, Sling, and Amazon Prime.
